channel.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
channel.description:
To start off, I really don't care about haters and if you don't like it, don't comment.The website link is simply to view the updates before they are actually updated on here.
I know people do not like the Project Insanity base much because it is used by practically everyone, especially leechers, but I am eventually going to heavily modify it. Also since quite a few people here on mopar like old school servers I am making the server like a classic, but I am keeping certain things like the up to date servers.
I am the only person coding the source, and I wouldn't say I am an expert but I am going to make the best out of my abilities to turn this into a very nice classic server with new RS items, no customs, and several unique things.
Server Base: Project Insanity. Client Base: No official client yet.
Here is a video of: 1) Godsword assembling and dis-assembling. 2) Spirit shield assembling(with use of holy elixir). 3) Dragonfire shield assembling.
Link: [url=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xO0LHIiEu5k]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xO0LHIiEu5k[/url]
Here is a picture of some of the items that have been added with correct bonuses.
[img]http://i54.tinypic.com/2ev44rb.jpg[/img]
Updates Log: [code] Webclient finished. #22/07/11 Highscores system(still fixing little bugs). #22/07/11 Vote reward system(still fixing little bugs). #22/07/11 New custom training area. #21/07/11 Slayer monsters requirement levels changed higher. #21/07/11 All monster drops changed. #21/07/11 Casket system(credits to tutorial maker). #20/07/11 Crystal chest system(credits to tutorial maker, and me for tweaks). #20/07/11 All xp rates changed to make level 135s take a weeks work to get. #20/07/11 Max level raised to 135 with a maximum of 500m xp. #19/07/11 Rocktail fishing added with a requirement of 100. #19/07/11 [/code]
More updates, videos and pictures coming soon!
Check out the new Skillzlyfe 317 on the forums which is coming soon

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

Don’t grave dig. I quit this server. I don’t make RSPS anymore, got better things to do. I only come on these forums to help people.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @im0wnag3 im0wnag3
item.description:
@im0wnag3 wrote:

Dont delete godswords, keep them in game, but just make you cant use them in wild OR just in specifick area’s (Dont know how to write it, but i think you know what i mean :D)

Read full topic

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

The max is going to be 135 so the levellingis going to be rather easy, and get slower at 110+ besides combat which will be slightly faster than non-combat skills for the bosses I will be adding.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:12, topic:405806”]I guess not everyone will be satisfied, but seeing as quite a few people like the old servers, I guess I can put all my hard work into an old classic server, but with the exception of no customs.

Easy levelling, custom objects( not exactly custom but like elemental making dragon etc) and other stuff like that, that some old servers had.[/quote]
Do all of that, but don’t make it easy easy leveling. That is not very fun. =P

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

I guess not everyone will be satisfied, but seeing as quite a few people like the old servers, I guess I can put all my hard work into an old classic server, but with the exception of no customs.

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:10, topic:405806”]So if I used a clean project insanity and go it to work with the Moparscape 3.2 client, you guys would be happy about that?[/quote]You can never satisfy completely, but I would be happy with or without the Mopar client.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:7, topic:405806”]So if I keep the classics, but with an old school client with the old rs gameframe, you reckon people would be happier playing? I was keeping level 135 max because it makes it more fun competing for a level higher than 99. And also items and better custom ores etc.

I will look through clients, but I will also be removing some crap out of the PI source like dclaws special etc, because then it would be more like a classic.

Well, I could go either way here. Godswords or no godswords.[/quote]

Max level 135 is a great idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @buut15 buut15
item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

[quote=“demps2k9, post:7, topic:405806”]So if I keep the classics, but with an old school client with the old rs gameframe, you reckon people would be happier playing? I was keeping level 135 max because it makes it more fun competing for a level higher than 99. And also items and better custom ores etc.

I will look through clients, but I will also be removing some crap out of the PI source like dclaws special etc, because then it would be more like a classic.

Well, I could go either way here. Godswords or no godswords.[/quote]
Or you could make a server that works on the MoparScape client 3.2. I would enjoy that greatly. =P

Read full topic

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

So if I keep the classics, but with an old school client with the old rs gameframe, you reckon people would be happier playing? I was keeping level 135 max because it makes it more fun competing for a level higher than 99. And also items and better custom ores etc.

I will look through clients, but I will also be removing some crap out of the PI source like dclaws special etc, because then it would be more like a classic.

Well, I could go either way here. Godswords or no godswords.

I suppose I could go for an old school client, but I don’t know whether to keep godswords etc. Have any idea’s?

item.title: Skillzlyfe Reborn
item.dc:creator: @demps2k9 demps2k9
item.description:
@demps2k9 wrote:

To start off, I really don’t care about haters and if you don’t like it, don’t comment.The website link is simply to view the updates before they are actually updated on here.

I know people do not like the Project Insanity base much because it is used by practically everyone, especially leechers, but I am eventually going to heavily modify it. Also since quite a few people here on mopar like old school servers I am making the server like a classic, but I am keeping certain things like the up to date servers.

I am the only person coding the source, and I wouldn’t say I am an expert but I am going to make the best out of my abilities to turn this into a very nice classic server with new RS items, no customs, and several unique things.

Server Base: Project Insanity.
Client Base: No official client yet.

Here is a video of:

  1. Godsword assembling and dis-assembling.
  2. Spirit shield assembling(with use of holy elixir).
  3. Dragonfire shield assembling.

Link: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xO0LHIiEu5k

Here is a picture of some of the items that have been added with correct bonuses.

Updates Log:

Webclient finished. #22/07/11
Highscores system(still fixing little bugs). #22/07/11
Vote reward system(still fixing little bugs). #22/07/11
New custom training area. #21/07/11

Crystal chest system(credits to tutorial maker, and me for tweaks). #20/07/11
All xp rates changed to make level 135s take a weeks work to get. #20/07/11
Max level raised to 135 with a maximum of 500m xp. #19/07/11

More updates, videos and pictures coming soon!
